text: John Bottomley (September 17, 1960 - April 6, 2011) was a Canadian singer- songwriter. He started in music in the early 1980s with the band Tulpa, which also included his brother Chris,"Singer-songwriter John Bottomley dies at age 50". His most successful album, 1995's Blackberry, spawned the Top 40 hits "You Lose and You Gain" and "Long Way to Go". Bottomley died in 2011 in Brackendale, British Columbia.
